titleStmt.title: Bumm-foder, or, Waste-paper proper to wipe the nation's rump with or your own
titleStmt.author: Brome, Alexander, 1620-1666.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alexander Brome by Harvard--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and the British Library.
